entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1005 - Statement - Etat des flux de trésorerie but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:EffectOfExchangeRateChangesOnCashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1007 - Statement - Etat des variations des capitaux propres but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions, iva:IssueOfEquityExceptAsAResultOfShareBasedPaymentAndBeforeTransactionCosts, ifrs-full:ShareIssueRelatedCost, ifrs-full:Equity, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughAppropriationOfRetainedEarnings, iva:AppropriationOfTheIssuePremium, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughExerciseOfWarrantsEquity, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughTreasuryShareTransactions, ifrs-full:IssueOfEquity, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesEquity, iva:IncreaseThroughShareWarrantsSubscriptionPremium All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1006 - Statement - Etat des flux de trésorerie (Entre parenthèses) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. iva:ShareSubscriptionPremiums, iva:DecreaseInAbbotReceivable, iva:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInPrepaidExpensesReceivables All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -
